summary: Adds crafting and improving to Gizmodian\'s Oblivion Weapons at its own custom forge in the Blacksmiths\' Guild Cavern - no more crafting menu clutter!
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=yellow][size=+2]Gizmodian\'s Oblivion Weapons at The Blacksmiths\' Guild[/color][/size]


[color=orange][size=+1]*****Eliminates crafting menu clutter by placing items into their own exclusive forge*****[/color][/size]


[color=red][size=+1]*****This mod is a crafting .esp only and contains no weapons meshes/textures!!!!***** [/color][/size][/center]

[size=+1]How does it work?[/size] 

[color=orange][size=+1]1)[/color][/size] Download/Install/NMM Blacksmiths\' Guild core mod
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17524] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17524[/url]

[color=orange][size=+1]2)[/color][/size] Download/Install/NMM Gizmodian Oblivion Weapons for Skyrim
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13665] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13665[/url]

[color=orange][size=+1]3)[/color][/size] Download/Install/NMM the SG_Gizmodian file from this page here . . . the one you\'re on now . . . 

[color=orange][size=+1]4)[/color][/size] De-activate/Uncheck Gizmodian-Obliviweapons.esp 
this step will:
-	keep Gizmodian\'s meshes/textures \'in the background\'
-	eliminate the \'Urn of free weapons\' previously available from the Drunken Hunstman
-	eliminate the \'full ebony\' weapon pack stats from the original file

[color=orange][size=+1]5)[/color][/size] Confirm my SG_Gizmodian.esp is Activated/Checked
this step will:
-	allow my .esp to access Gizmodian\'s meshes/textures
-	add Gizmodian\'s Weapons to Gizmodian\'s Forge at the Blacksmiths\' Guild
-	distribute Gizmodian\'s Oblivion Weapons across the crafting categories 
---	Orcish x 2/Dwarven x 4/Elven x 7/Glass x 6/Ebony x 5/Daedric x 4
-	add a light sprinkling of Gizmodian\'s weapons to the Bandit and Necromancer levelled lists
---	this allows mid and late game access to these great weapons

----------------------------------

[color=red][size=+1][u]Do Not[/u] use with my Gizmodian Oblivion Weapons Craftable mod.  It is one or the other - not both!!![/color][/size]

----------------------------------

[size=+1][color=orange]PERMISSIONS[/size][/color]

Gizmodian is the owner of the intellectual property/assets presented here - I only added the \'craftability.\' Feel free to open up my .esp and play with it; but, give me some credit if you then re-upload anything.

Check with Gizmodian about the meshes/textures - Giz is pretty \'open source\' about the assets but do the right thing, check with Giz before you do anything. 

-------------------------------------------

[size=+1][color=orange]CREDITS[/size][/color]

GIZMODIAN, dammit, I have written it enough times above - it\'s Giz\'s stuff, man!

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13665]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13665[/url]

Gizmodian - thanks for the \'okay\' to mess with your stuff . . .
author: NordHammer
